issue.title: [R] Implement initial Substrait consumer in the R bindings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15818](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15818). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After ARROW-15238 we have the possibility for a Substrait consumer in C++! As we work on R bindings for Substrait, it will be useful for us to have some way to send Substrait objects into Arrow to make sure we're on the right track.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15818?focusedCommentId=17514095) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12564
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12564>
